post.body: is ur Wing's Wi-Fi turned off??
sounds like pupu to me...
my old Office is on the corner of Sheridan & Piikoi, that store whole area is a traffic/shopping vortex...heaven help you!
It's open 24hrs, has an L&L inside, and has Sam's Club above it, aside from that, Good Luck!
Fried Saimin buddy!
enjoy ur shopping, they will be closing that store soon.
the photo of the Fried Noodles & Chicken was tastier...
Good Luck to you all! I heard Ben Guitierez will be leaving too...
What, no crackers for lunch?!? What's this world coming to?? I better alert the media, oh wait...
you know it pal! Ige's, home of Shoyu Pork & Andagi!!
Just noticed Starbucks lids have a 6 way cut for the straw hole...much easier to punch straw in now.
Meeting my Aunt, Uncle, & Cousin for lunch @ Big City Diner Pearlridge. It's crazy @ the Mall!!!
Lunchtime, leftovers from Kapolei Chun-Wah Kam!! "Yum-Yum!!"
Traffic snarled due to Obama visit. H-3 Kailua bound closed...
Taro cake @ Chun-Wah Kam Kapolei...Winner!!
Lunch...mmmm @ the new Kapolei Chun-Wah Kam!! "Yum-yum"
Just finished fighting Da hordes @ Ewa Post Office..."Whew". Off 2 Costco for gas.
Hats off to the USPS employees @ the Post Office 4 great service & 4 putting up with impatient customers!
Finally found time to watch this week's episode of "Big Bang Theory", ROFL when Sheldon got his gift!! Hahaha!
http://twitpic.com/u0mh - My Co-worker Walt's desk, obvious winner to the cubicle decorating contest!
